name: Unleash Triceratops
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You summon a triceratops to an empty space within range you can see. It takes its turn after yours and obeys your mental orders.

Creatures summoned by this spell count as beasts in addition to their normal typing. They are treated as reanimated creatures.

Casting this spell again causes the previous triceratops to vanish.
empower: The summoned triceratops gains 20 feet movement speed and +2 Strength.
